languages.text: {n}Выждав недолгую паузу, к вам обращается сгорбленный оборванец. Беззубый рот старика источает гнилостное дыхание, когда он произносит всего три слова:{/n} "Ш-ш-шмерть... са шис-с-снь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Выждав недолгую паузу, к вам обращается сгорбленный оборванец. Беззубый рот старика источает гнилостное дыхание, когда он произносит всего три слова:{/n} "Ш-ш-шмерть... са шис-с-снь..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."
languages.original_text: {n}Выждав недолгую паузу, к вам обращается сгорбленный оборванец. Беззубый рот старика источает гнилостное дыхание, когда он произносит всего три слова:{/n} "Ш-ш-шмерть... са шис-с-снь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}在短暂的停顿之后，一位破衣烂衫的驼背老人朝你走了过来。这个老人的牙齿已经掉光。他张开口，呼出一团恶臭。断断续续地说了四个字：{/n}“重……获……新生……”
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}在短暂的停顿之后，一位破衣烂衫的驼背老人朝你走了过来。这个老人的牙齿已经掉光。他张开口，呼出一团恶臭。断断续续地说了四个字：{/n}“重……获……新生……”
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Tras concederte un breve respiro, un mendigo encorvado se acerca a ti. La boca desdentada del anciano emite una nube de aliento putrefacto mientras pronuncia solo tres palabras:{/n} «M-m-muerte... p-p-por vida...».
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras concederte un breve respiro, un mendigo encorvado se acerca a ti. La boca desdentada del anciano emite una nube de aliento putrefacto mientras pronuncia solo tres palabras:{/n} «M-m-muerte... p-p-por vida...».
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}少しばかり間を置いて、身体を丸めたならず者が近づいてくる。その老人は歯のない口で3語だけ話すと同時に、腐った空気のかたまりを吐き出した。{/n}「しんででで…ま、まご、いいいかす…」
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}少しばかり間を置いて、身体を丸めたならず者が近づいてくる。その老人は歯のない口で3語だけ話すと同時に、腐った空気のかたまりを吐き出した。{/n}「しんででで…ま、まご、いいいかす…」
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, un vieux bossu édenté s'approche de vous et vous adresse la parole, vous soufflant au visage son haleine pestilentielle en l'espace de ces quelques mots :{/n} « Une m-m-mort... p-p-pour une vie... »
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, un vieux bossu édenté s'approche de vous et vous adresse la parole, vous soufflant au visage son haleine pestilentielle en l'espace de ces quelques mots :{/n} « Une m-m-mort... p-p-pour une vie... »
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause tritt ein gebückter alter Mann in Lumpen an dich heran. Aus seinem zahnlosen Mund entweicht eine faule Wolke, als er gerade mal drei Worte sagt:{/n} "Tod-d-d ... f-f-für Leben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause tritt ein gebückter alter Mann in Lumpen an dich heran. Aus seinem zahnlosen Mund entweicht eine faule Wolke, als er gerade mal drei Worte sagt:{/n} "Tod-d-d ... f-f-für Leben ..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir süre sonra yanına iki büklüm olmuş, üstü başı perişan bir adam yaklaşıyor. İhtiyarın dişsiz ağzından sadece üç kelime çıkarken etrafı bir leş kokusu sarıyor.{/n} "Ö... Öl... Ölüm... K... K... Karşılığında... Yaşam..."
languages.original_text: {n}After allowing you a brief pause, a hunched ragamuffin approaches you. The old man's toothless mouth breathes out a putrefying cloud of air as he speaks only three words:{/n} "Death-th-th... f-f-for life..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kısa bir süre sonra yanına iki büklüm olmuş, üstü başı perişan bir adam yaklaşıyor. İhtiyarın dişsiz ağzından sadece üç kelime çıkarken etrafı bir leş kokusu sarıyor.{/n} "Ö... Öl... Ölüm... K... K... Karşılığında... Yaşam..."
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan
